DOC.criteria: Meets 1 follow criterion : Diagnosis metastatic cancer include , limited , follow : Stage IV nonsmall cell lung cancer Extensivestage small cell lung cancer Metastatic testicular cancer Stage IV breast carcinoma Stage III IV ovarian carcinoma Stage IV endometrial carcinoma Stage IV prostate carcinoma Stage IV colorectal pancreatic cancer Stage IV renal cancer Stage III IV nonHodgkin 's lymphoma Stage IV bladder cancer Stage III multiple myeloma ( SalmonDurie stag ) Metastatic melanoma Metastatic sarcoma Healthy participant , meet follow criterion : No prior cancer Over 50 year age Serious medical psychiatric condition would preclude study compliance Chemotherapy radiotherapy within past 3 month ( patient ) Prior immunosuppressive therapy radiotherapy disease ( healthy participant )
